item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I’m Thang Pham, aka aome. I’m currently a third-year Computer Science student at University of Waterloo. I enjoy building things and tinkering with cool tech. Currently, I’m interested in developing software for robotics and automation systems. During my free time, I work on different side projects building tools for my personal uses, browse Reddit, or read articles and blog posts in Hacker News, Lobsters, and related websites. Other facts about me if you’re interested:

item.title: TIL
item.description: My own collection of tech-related TILs
